Dgame.Graphic.Blend



struct Blend;
The Blending struct enables the use of OpenGl Blending

Author:
Randy Schuett (rswhite4@googlemail.com)

static immutable Blend One;
Both Factors (destination and source) are Factor.One

static immutable Blend Zero;
Both Factors (destination and source) are Factor.Zero

static immutable Blend Default;
source is Factor.SrcAlpha and destination is Factor.OneMinusSrcAlpha This is the default Blending in Dgame

enum Factor: uint;
The Factor enum

Zero


One


SrcColor


OneMinusSrcColor


DstColor


OneMinusDstColor


SrcAlpha


OneMinusSrcAlpha


DstAlpha


OneMinusDstAlpha


Factor srcColor;
The source color Factor

Factor dstColor;
The destination color Factor

const nothrow @nogc void apply();
Apply the Blending
